edge: sets out on a journey to discover true happiness
discovers true happiness and comes upon a holy stone in a forest occupied by Panjurli Daiva
warns the king that his family and successors should keep their word and not reclaim the land, which will incur the wrath of Panjurli's companion, the ferocious demigod named Guliga Daiva
asks a Bhoota Kola performer, who is possessed by Panjurli to make the locals hand over the land to him
refuses and states that if the former goes to court for the decision of the land, then the Daiva will give his decision on the stairs of the court only
dies mysteriously of heart attack, where he was going to argue the land case
is tasked with converting the villagers' land into a forest reserve
disagreement over converting the villagers' land into a forest reserve
backed by his patron and the village's landlord
appointed as a forest guard by his connections
heads to with Devendra's henchman Sudhakara
rift due to Shiva's involvement in the feud between Murali and himself and Leela following orders
accidentally gets crushed by the trunk of a tree during search for Shiva and his friends and companions due to miscalculation
reunites after the feud between Murali and himself and Leela following orders
arrest avoidance, caught by police and forest guards
ulterior motive, bribery attempt, enmity
near-death experience, possession by spirit
Shiva possesses the power of Guliga Daiva, which allows him to brutally kill Devendra and his henchmen.
During the Bhoota Kola, Shiva is possessed by Panjurli.
In the symbolic gesture, Shiva and Murali join hands.
Before disappearing into the forest, Shiva meets what seems to be the spirit of his father.
